Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system the "Trooper Fabio Buttitta Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates the bridge over the Southern State Parkway on Bay Shore Road between Howells Road and Storey Boulevard in the town of Islip, county of Suffolk, the "Trooper Fabio Buttitta Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system the "Trooper Fabio Buttitta Memorial Bridge"
